radiographic_examinations.findings: Multiple subependymal nodules and cortical tubers bilaterally, low signal on T2-weighted images, high signal on T1-weighted images, no notable enhancement after contrast.
Enlarged kidneys (right 7.5 cm; left 9.3 cm) with multiple large bilateral cysts (up to 4 cm), no solid mass.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Enlarging multicystic kidneys at 6 months (right 14.8 cm; left 15.7 cm).

radiographic_examinations.findings: Innumerable cysts throughout both kidneys, largest cyst approximately 10.5 cm, thin septation within a complex cyst (2.3 cm), no solid lesions.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Increase in the size of the complex cyst, a change in appearance, and development of an irregular enhancing solid component (3.3 cm) at 6 years 8 months.

radiographic_examinations.findings: Enlarging solid component with no increase in size of the complex cyst; cystic areas were smaller, central component more solid and enhanced.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Continued slight enlargement of the complex cyst; progressive increase in solid enhancing component noted.
